function.name: rp_extrapolate
function.description: Sets a flag that allows extrapolation to 1.5*Tmax and returns a verification string. (flag = 0: no extrapolation past Tmax; 1: extrapolate to 1.5 x Tmax)

function.name: rp_getname
function.description: Returns the full fluid name description of the loaded fluid file. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 1 for a pure fluid. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_getcasn
function.description: Returns the CAS Number of the loaded fluid file. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 1 for a pure fluid. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_getvers
function.description: Returns the version of the Refprop Mathcad Add-in. The parameter idum is an arbitrary number (ie. 0).

function.name: rp_getNIST
function.description: Returns the version of the NIST Refprop library and materials properties being used. The parameter idum is an arbitrary number (ie. 0).

function.name: rp_getpath
function.description: Returns the path found to the NIST Refprop DLL being used. The parameter idum is an arbitrary number (ie. 0). This function can be useful when debugging the NIST Refprop installation location or when multiple version are loaded on the machine.

function.name: rp_wmol
function.description: Returns the molecular weight of the loaded fluid [gm/mol]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_tcrit
function.description: Returns the critical temperature of the loaded fluid [K]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_pcrit
function.description: Returns the critical pressure of the loaded fluid [MPa]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhocrit
function.description: Returns the critical density of the loaded fluid [kg/m³]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_ttrip
function.description: Returns the triple point temperature of the loaded fluid [K]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_ptrip
function.description: Returns the triple point pressure of the loaded fluid [MPa]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhotrip
function.description: Returns the triple point density of the loaded fluid [kg/m³]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rgas
function.description: Returns the ideal gas constant used by the loaded fluid [J/mol*K]. The parameter, icomp, is the component number in a mixture; 0 for the mixture value (same as 1 for a pure fluid). The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_psatt
function.description: Returns the saturation pressure [MPa]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhoft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid density [kg/m³]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_hft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_uft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid internal energy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_sft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cpft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cvft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_wft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid sonic velocity [m/s]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_kft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid thermal conductivity [W/m-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_muft
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid viscosity [µPa-s]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhogt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor density [kg/m³]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_hgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_ugt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor internal energy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_sgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cpgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cvgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_wgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor sonic velocity [m/s]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_kgt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor thermal conductivity [W/m-K]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_mugt
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor viscosity [µPa-s]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_surften
function.description: Returns the liquid-vapor surface tension coefficient [N/m]. The parameter, t, is the input saturation temperature [K]. The function is only defined for saturation temperatures between the triple point and the critical point. Temperatures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_tsatp
function.description: Returns the saturation temperature [K]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhofp
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid density [kg/m³]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_hfp
function.description: Returns the saturated liquid enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.description: Returns the saturated vapor density [kg/m³]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.description: Returns the saturated vapor enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.description: Returns the saturated vapor internal energy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_sgp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cpgp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cvgp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_wgp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor sonic velocity [m/s]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_kgp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor thermal conductivity [W/m-K]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_mugp
function.description: Returns the saturated vapor viscosity [µPa-s]. The parameter, p, is the input saturation pressure [MPa]. The function is only defined for saturation pressures between the triple point and the critical point. Pressures outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhotp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor density [kg/m³]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_htp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_utp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor internal energy [kJ/kg]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_stp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cptp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_cvtp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_wtp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor sonic velocity [m/s]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_ktp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor thermal conductivity [W/m-K]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_mutp
function.description: Returns the subcooled liquid or superheated vapor viscosity [µPa-s]. The parameters, t and p, are the input temperature [K] and pressure [Mpa]. Each fluid is defined with minimum and maximum temperatures and pressures over which the property curves are defined. Inputs outside this range will generate an error. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_tph
function.description: Returns the fluid temperature in any phase [K]. The parameters, p and h, are the input pressure [MPa] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_tps
function.description: Returns the fluid temperature in any phase [K]. The parameters, p and h, are the input pressure [MPa] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_ths
function.description: Returns the fluid temperature in any phase [K]. The parameters, h and s, are the input enthalpy [kJ/kg] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_phs
function.description: Returns the fluid pressure in any phase [MPa]. The parameters, h and s, are the input enthalpy [kJ/kg] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_pth
function.description: Returns the fluid pressure in any phase [MPa]. The parameters, t and h, are the input temperature [K] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_pts
function.description: Returns the fluid pressure in any phase [MPa]. The parameters, t and s, are the input temperature [K] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhoth
function.description: Returns the fluid density in any single phase [kg/m³]. An error is returned in the two-phase saturation region. The parameters, t and h, are the input temperature [K] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhots
function.description: Returns the fluid density in any single phase [kg/m³]. An error is returned in the two-phase saturation region. The parameters, t and s, are the input temperature [K] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhoph
function.description: Returns the fluid density in any single phase [kg/m³]. An error is returned in the two-phase saturation region. The parameters, p and h, are the input pressure [MPa] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_rhops
function.description: Returns the fluid density in any single phase [kg/m³]. An error is returned in the two-phase saturation region. The parameters, p and s, are the input pressure [MPa] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state pressure and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_sph
function.description: Returns the fluid entropy in any phase [kJ/kg-K]. The parameters, p and h, are the input pressure [MPa] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_hps
function.description: Returns the fluid enthalpy in any phase [kJ/kg]. The parameters, p and h, are the input pressure [MPa] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_sth
function.description: Returns the fluid entropy in any phase [kJ/kg-K]. The parameters, t and h, are the input temperature [K] and enthalpy [kJ/kg]. The parameter, r, specifies if the lower root (r=1) or the upper root (r=2) is requested. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).

function.name: rp_hts
function.description: Returns the fluid enthalpy in any phase [kJ/kg]. The parameters, t and h, are the input temperature [K] and entropy [kJ/kg-K]. This function performs an iterative search for the state temperature and may be slower than other functions. The parameter, flstr, is a string containing the Refprop fluid file name (Press F1 for help on defining this string).
